lines.author: Clara
lines.text: Merry Christmas! How is the party? Are you enjoying it?

lines.author: Girl in the white dress
lines.text: Merry Christmas Clara! Yes, of course. Whenever we see an invitation from your parents we know we HAVE to attend. These are the best Christmas parties in town.

lines.author: Girl in the black dress
lines.text: Have you tried these cakes yet? I don't know what the baker puts in them, I can't stop eating!

lines.author: Girl in the white dress
lines.text: And then you wonder why your clothes won't fit you anymore...

lines.author: Girl in the black dress
lines.text: Oh you didn't say that! How can you when it's you that---
